57550|GECCO|2005|Learned mutation strategies in genetic programming for evolution and adaptation of simulated snakebot|In this work we propose an approach of incorporating learned mutation strategies (LMS) in genetic programming (GP) employed for evolution and adaptation of locomotion gaits of simulated snake-like robot (Snakebot). 57546|GECCO|2005|Applying metaheuristic techniques to search the space of bidding strategies in combinatorial auctions|Many non-cooperative settings that could potentially be studied using game theory are characterized by having very large strategy spaces and payoffs that are costly to compute.
